ca.uqac.lif.cep

Class FileHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uqac.lif.cep.FileHelper

  • public class FileHelper
extends Object
    A number of helpful utilities to read, write and manage files

      • readToString

        public static String readToString(File f)
        Reads the contents of a file and puts it into a string.
        Parameters:
        f - The file to read
        Returns:
        The string with the file's contents, or the empty string if an error occurred.

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Returns:

      • writeFromString

        public static void writeFromString(File f,
                   String content)
        Writes the content of a string to a file
        Parameters:
        f - The file to write to. If the file does not exist, it will be created
        content - The content to write

        Parameters:

        public static void writeFromBytes(File f,
                  byte[] bFile)
        Writes to a file from an array of bytes
        Parameters:
        f - The file to write to. If the file does not exist, it will be created
        bFile - The content to write

      • deleteFile

        public static boolean deleteFile(String filename)
        Deletes a file
        Parameters:
        filename - The filename
        Returns:
        true if the file could be deleted, false otherwise

      • fileExists

        public static boolean fileExists(String filename)
        Checks whether a file exists in the filesystem
        Parameters:
        filename - The filename to look for
        Returns:
        true if file exists, false otherwise

      • replaceExtension

        public static String replaceExtension(String filename,
                      String extension)
        Replace the extension of a filename with another. For example, one can replace /my/path/foo.bar with /my/path/foo.baz.
        Parameters:
        filename - The original filename
        extension - The extension to replace with
        Returns:
        The modified filename

      • trimExtension

        public static String trimExtension(String filename)
        Trims the extension of a filename. For example, with /my/path/foo.bar, would return /my/path/foo
        Parameters:
        filename - The filename
        Returns:
        The filename without the extension

        public static boolean internalFileExists(Class<?> c,
                         String path)
        Checks if an internal file exists
        Parameters:
        c - The reference class
        path - The path of the file
        Returns:
        true if the file exists, false otherwise

      • streamToString

        public static String streamToString(InputStream in)
                             throws IOException
        Reads a file and puts its contents in a string
        Parameters:
        in - The input stream to read
        Returns:
        The file's contents, and empty string if the file does not exist
        Throws:
